detail_desc: Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the front and long sleeves.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and a sewn-on bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie at the top, sewn-on waistcoat with decorative buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Pile lining.
Elasticated scrunchie in pleated jersey with a sheen.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: On The Prowl V Brief SPEED
detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist.
Hair elastics with metal decorations in the shape of flowers.
Joggers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Gently fitted, padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable padded hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.

Suit trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Trousers in superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim, 3/4-length legs with slits at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a nylon rustle weave with a high waist and patch front pockets. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems.
Cropped top in ribbed cotton jersey with a washed look, long sleeves with visible zips along the outside, ribbing around the neckline and a raw-edge hem

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Lined, detachable hood with press-studs at the front and a detachable faux fur trim. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, two zipped chest pockets, two flap patch pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Negligee in lace and mesh with an integral super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long-sleeved body in stretch lace with a round neckline and narrow, vertical elastication down the front, back and sides, as well as on the sleeves for a draped effect. Press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back.

Short, wide parka in nylon with a high collar, zip down the front and a wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastenings. Yoke at the front and back, large flap front pockets and wide sleeves with a tab and concealed hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Cropped, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs and a cut-off hem.
T-shirt in lightweight cotton jersey with a deep V-neck.
Blouse in a cotton weave with embroidered sections. Small frilled collar, pin-tucks and concealed buttons down the front, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cotton jersey top with long raglan sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and cuffs.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a soft pile inside and imitation leather details. Collar, zip down the front and zipped side pockets.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Storage boxes in patterned cardboard with lids. The boxes come in two different sizes: 20x20x20 cm and 17x17x17 cm.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, wide, bell sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and cotton blend.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke at the front and short butterfly sleeves.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Top in a soft, fine, airy knit with a round neck, long sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a gathered seam at the back and down the sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Calf-length dress in airy cotton poplin with a square neckline at the front and low-cut back with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and gathered seams under the bust and at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long skirt in woven fabric with a draped front, high slit and asymmetric hem. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined at the top.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer at the back.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey. Top with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with a large compartment with a two-way zip at the front and two small inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. Concealed, zipped compartment at the back in which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap at the top when the bag is folded away. Size 8x16.5x38 cm. Size when folded 3x9.5x20 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy, floral-print viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover with buttons at the front.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a zip down the front and a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Fitted blouse in an airy viscose weave with a smocked bodice and square neckline with a small frill trim and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with frill trims.
Platform trainers in imitation suede with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Imitation leather bag with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size 13x17x22.5 cm.
Boxy jumper in a fine knit with a soft brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short dolman sleeves. One top has a print motif on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a hole pattern. Low waist and ties at the sides.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
Fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with a deep V-neck and long sleeves.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in cotton twill with a collar with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the top. Loose yoke front and back with a button, shoulder tabs with a button, an adjustable belt with a buckle at the waist and an adjustable tab with a buckle at the cuffs. Two inner pockets with a button, and a high-cut single back vent with a concealed button. Lined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Knee-length shorts in twill made from a linen and cotton blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a regular waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. Embroidery around the waistband and at the hems.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in patterned cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist. Leg pockets, one of which has a text print, tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and ribbed hems.
Sun hats in an airy cotton weave with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm. Lined.

Fitted, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Hard smartphone case in plastic with a glittery back. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.
